item.title: Writing
item.description: Interplays of Mathematics and Classism Interplays of Mathematics and Classism Working Title: Interplays of Mathematics and Classism Midyear 2021 ‚≠êÔ∏è Hello! I’m Chloe. Welcome to my working file of Interplays of Mathematics and Classism . This file contains my thought processes involved in writing my capstone divided into three phases‚Äìpre-writing, rough writing, and actual writing (okay, I honestly don’t know if there are more technicalities on this). üí≠ I’m an intuitive thinker, so you can find that most of the notes here are scattered and out of place, but in a sense… organized.
